participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: outgoing and nurturing, loves connecting with nature and her students.
participant_1.background: i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i've a dogs. i'm a woman. i work as a school teacher. i attend church every week.

participant_2.background: i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i am 60 years old. i really like to travel.
